p: The mean mortality data of the three replicates per dose (4–5 doses per terpene or mixtures) were used to determine the LC 50 and LC 50PBO. Probit analysis (POLO-PLUS software, LeOra Software, United States) was used to analyze the dose–mortality response. GraphPad Prism 5 was used to draw the isobologram graphs ( Tang et al., 2002).
